Call us (+234) 906 922 2921 to order materials for your children!

We will take care of your children

The Children’s Ministry of Salvation Ministries is the arm of the church that nurtures children spiritually and mentally to grow in Christ; to make them well grounded in the principles of the Kingdom of God. The Children’s Ministry is a replica of the adult church where children between ages 2 and 11 worship God.

Our Classes

The Children’s Ministry is a replica of the adult church where children between ages 2 and 11 worship God!

Ages 2 - 6

In this class children between the ages of 2 – 6 are nurtured  spiritually and mentally to grow in Christ!

Ages 7 - 11

In this class children between the ages of 7 – 11 are nurtured  spiritually and mentally to grow in Christ!

Children Ministry Testimonies from the globe

The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
– Psalms 126:3

I believe in lifelong learning and they are a great place to learn from experts. I've learned a lot and recommend it.

Testimony One

My daughter was a student for 3 years. I would like to thank the leading lights family for groom her.

Testimony Two

My heartfelt gratitude to God, for all He has done, and is still doing in my life.
